I am quantitative research faculty with the [Addiction Science Team](https://www.mimhaddisci.org/) at the [Missouri Institute of Mental Health](https://mimh.edu) at [University of Missouri--St. Louis](https://www.umsl.edu/). My work focuses on scale development, measurement and the measurement error of administrative data, and treatment outcomes.
